title: What is the pricing for TimeTaker?
description: TimeTaker is free for personal use, and we would like to keep it that way. We are working on paid features for teams. You can find more info and FAQs about pricing here.

title: What data does TimeTaker track?
description: We respect privacy and never collect any sensitive data. Some interactions in the app are tracked anonymously. For instance, we save usage statistics and error reports to constantly fix bugs and improve our product

title: How does TimeTaker handle my data?
description: TimeTaker is a pure browser citizen which doesn't require any data from your device. Sensitive data is encrypted and stored locally.

title: Is TimeTaker available on every browser?
description: We want to nail the app for Chrome first. Afterwards we will apply our learnings to the other clients.
